column3: 4 pat-pat rinsed mushrooms dry with a paper towel
8 Heat-Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
9 add-Once the pan is hot, add the mushrooms
10 cook-cook for 3-5 minutes, stirring often, until mushrooms start to soften and brown
11 Add-Add chopped shallot to the pan
15 cook-cook the pan, often stirring, for 1 minute
14 Add-1/4 tbsp balsamic vinegar to the pan
13 Add-Add 2 cloves of minced garlic to the pan
15 cook-cook the pan, often stirring, for 1 minute
18 Transfer-Transfer the contents of the pan to a serving dish
